services.name: Water Purifier Service
services.description: Professional water purifier maintenance and repair services. Our experts ensure clean and safe drinking water for your family.

services.name: Microwave Service
services.description: Expert microwave repair and servicing. We fix heating problems, turntable malfunctions, and all microwave issues with warranty.

services.name: Gas Geyser Repair Service
services.description: Comprehensive gas geyser repair and maintenance services. Professional installation, repair, and troubleshooting with same-day service.

services.name: Chimney Repair Service
services.description: Specialized chimney repair and maintenance services. Deep cleaning, part replacement, and performance optimization for your kitchen chimney.

services.name: CCTV Installation Service
services.description: Professional CCTV installation and maintenance services. Enhanced security solutions for residential and commercial properties.

services.name: Mobile Repair Service
services.description: Expert mobile phone repair services. Screen replacement, battery issues, software problems, and all mobile repair needs covered.

services.name: AC Repair
services.description: Professional AC repair and maintenance services. Our experts will diagnose and fix your AC issues quickly and efficiently.

services.name: Geyser Repair
services.description: Professional geyser installation and repair services. Our experts handle all types of geysers with warranty.

services.name: Home Cleaning
services.description: Comprehensive home cleaning services. From regular cleaning to deep cleaning, we make your home spotless.

services.name: Washing Machine Repair
services.description: Professional washing machine repair services. We fix all types of washing machines with same-day service.
